00043 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00044 /// CGNATWindow::CGNATWindow
00045 ///
00046 /// @description    This is the constructor for the CGNATWindow class and
00047 ///                 initializes class variables.
00048 /// @pre            None
00049 /// @post           Class variables are initialized.
00050 ///
00051 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent object.
00052 /// @param flags:   This is the set of flags so the main window knows what
00053 ///                 options to use.
00054 ///
00055 /// @limitations    None
00056 ///
00057 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058 CGNATWindow::CGNATWindow( QWidget *parent, Qt::WFlags flags )
00059 : QMainWindow( parent, flags )
00060 {
00061     setupActions();
00062     setupMenuBar();
00063     setupToolBar();
00064     setupContent();
00065 
00066     enableFileDependantActions( false );
00067 
00068     m_curFileName = "";
00069     m_fileFilters = tr("GNAT files (*.gnat)\n"
00070                        "All files (*.*)");
00071 
00072     setupSettings();
00073     loadSettings();
00074 }
00075 
00076 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00077 /// CGNATWindow::~CGNATWindow
00078 ///
00079 /// @description  This is the destructor for the CGNATWindow class and saves
00080 ///               the program settings to the registery (or equivalent in UNIX
00081 ///               and Macintosh environments).
00082 /// @pre          None
00083 /// @post         Program settings are saved.
00084 ///
00085 /// @limitations  None
00086 ///
00087 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00088 CGNATWindow::~CGNATWindow()
00089 {
00090     saveSettings();
00091 }

00093 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094 /// CGNATWindow::aboutClicked
00095 ///
00096 /// @description  This function presents the user with the about box for the
00097 ///               GNAT application.
00098 /// @pre          None
00099 /// @post         None
00100 ///
00101 /// @limitations  None
00102 ///
00103 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00104 void CGNATWindow::aboutClicked()
00105 {
00106     QString string("GNAT Version ");
00107     string.append(QString::number(PROGRAM_VERSIONNUM));
00108     string.append("\nGraphical AI Tracer (The 'N' stand for nothing!)\n"
00109                   "Program Written by and Copyright Matt Dissinger, Bob "
00110                   "Buehler, Kyle Owen, and Ray Myers.\n");
00111     QMessageBox::about( this, "About GNAT", string );
00112 }

00114 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00115 /// CGNATWindow::enableFileDependantActions
00116 ///
00117 /// @description  This function enables or disables the QActions which are
00118 ///               dependant on having an open file.
00119 /// @pre          None
00120 /// @post         None
00121 ///
00122 /// @param on:    This variable is used to indicate if the QActions are being
00123 ///               enabled or disabled.
00124 ///
00125 /// @limitations  None
00126 ///
00127 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00128 void CGNATWindow::enableFileDependantActions( bool on )
00129 {
00130     m_saveAction->setEnabled(on);
00131     m_saveAsAction->setEnabled(on);
00132     m_saveImageAction->setEnabled(on);
00133 }

00135 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00136 /// CGNATWindow::launchWebTool
00137 ///
00138 /// @description  This function launches attempts to launch the default browser
00139 ///               on the user's current platform.
00140 /// @pre          None
00141 /// @post         None
00142 ///
00143 /// @param url:   This is the address that the browser should be pointed at on
00144 ///               success.
00145 ///
00146 /// @limitations  None
00147 ///
00148 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00149 void CGNATWindow::launchWebTool( const QString& url )
00150 {
00151     QProcess* web = new QProcess( this );
00152     bool supportedPlatform = true;
00153     bool executeProcess = false;
00154 
00155 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN32)
00156 /*#include <windows.h>
00157 
00158    //Trolltech's Windows Version Independent Default Browser Launch
00159     QT_WA(
00160         {ShellExecute( winId(), 0, (TCHAR*)url.ucs2(), 0, 0, SW_SHOWNORMAL );},
00161         {ShellExecuteA( winId(), 0, url.local8Bit(), 0, 0, SW_SHOWNORMAL );} );
00162 */
00163 
00164     supportedPlatform = false;
00165     executeProcess = false;
00166 #elif defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
00167 #include <stdio.h>
00168 #include <stdlib.h>
00169 
00170     //get : delimited list of all perferred browsers
00171     QCString allBrowsers = getenv( "BROWSER" );
00172 
00173     if( allBrowsers.isEmpty() ) //if it is empty we're hosed
00174     {
00175         qDebug( "No $BROWSER environment varialbe set." );
00176         supportedPlatform = false;
00177         executeProcess = false;
00178     }
00179     else
00180     {
00181         //split the list
00182         QStringList browsers = QStringList::split( ":" , allBrowsers );
00183 
00184         //grab the first (default)
00185         QString browser = *browsers.begin();
00186 
00187         if( browser.contains( "kfmclient" ) )
00188         {
00189             web->addArgument( "kfmclient" );
00190             web->addArgument( "exec" );
00191         }
00192         else
00193         {
00194             web->addArgument( browser );
00195         }
00196 
00197         web->addArgument( url );
00198 
00199         executeProcess = true;
00200     }
00201 #elif defined(Q_OS_MACX)
00202     //Trolltech's Mac OSX Version Independent Default Browser Launch
00203     web->addArgument( "/usr/bin/open" );
00204     web->addArgument( url );
00205     executeProcess = true;
00206 #else
00207     supportedPlatform = false;
00208     executeProcess = false;
00209 #endif
00210 
00211     int returnValue = 0;
00212     QObject::connect( web, SIGNAL( processExited() ),
00213                       web, SLOT( deleteLater() ) );
00214 
00215     if( executeProcess )
00216         web->start( "webTool" );
00217 
00218     if( returnValue || !supportedPlatform )
00219         QMessageBox::information( this, "Mapimg",
00220                     QString("Unable to launch web browser to %1").arg( url ) );
00221 
00222     return;
00223 }
00224 
00225 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00226 /// CGNATWindow::loadFile
00227 ///
00228 /// @description          This function opens the indicated file and opens the
00229 ///                       proper view associated with the file's view mode.
00230 /// @pre                  None
00231 /// @post                 The given file is opened, if it exists and is a valid
00232 ///                       file.
00233 ///
00234 /// @param openFileName:  This is the name of the file to be opened.
00235 ///
00236 /// @limitations          None
00237 ///
00238 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00239 void CGNATWindow::loadFile( QString openFileName )
00240 {
00241     //Create the view needed for the given filename.
00242     IGNATView *newView =
00243         CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView( openFileName, this );
00244 
00245     //Make sure the file name was valid and contained a valid GNAT file.
00246     if( newView == NULL )
00247         return;
00248 
00249     //If there was a file open, remove the toolbar used by it.
00250     if( m_view != NULL )
00251         removeToolBar( m_view->getToolBar() );
00252 
00253     //Add the new view appropriate toolbar.
00254     addToolBar( newView->getToolBar() );
00255 
00256     //Delete the old view if it existed.
00257     if( m_view )
00258         delete m_view;
00259     m_view = newView;
00260 
00261     enableFileDependantActions();
00262 
00263     m_default->setShown( false );
00264     m_view->setShown( true );
00265     setCentralWidget( m_view );
00266 
00267     m_curFileName = openFileName;
00268     m_filePath = openFileName.left( openFileName.lastIndexOf("/") );
00269 
00270     QSettings settings;
00271     settings.setValue( "recentfile", m_curFileName );
00272 }
00273 
00274 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00275 /// CGNATWindow::loadSettings
00276 ///
00277 /// @description  This function loads the program settings from the registry or
00278 ///               equivalent location for UNIX and Mac operating systems.
00279 /// @pre          None
00280 /// @post         The old program settings are loaded, if found.
00281 ///
00282 /// @limitations  None
00283 ///
00284 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00285 void CGNATWindow::loadSettings()
00286 {
00287     QSettings settings;
00288 
00289     resize( QSize(settings.value("size").toSize()).expandedTo(minimumSizeHint()) );
00290     if( settings.value("maximized").toBool() )
00291         showMaximized();
00292 
00293     m_filePath = settings.value( "filepath" ).toString();
00294     m_curFileName = settings.value( "recentfile" ).toString();
00295 }
00296 
00297 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00298 /// CGNATWindow::newClicked
00299 ///
00300 /// @description  This function is called when the user clicks the New option
00301 ///               to create a new file.
00302 /// @pre          None
00303 /// @post         A new file of the specified type is created.
00304 ///
00305 /// @limitations  None
00306 ///
00307 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00308 void CGNATWindow::newClicked()
00309 {
00310     //Prompt the user for which type of file they would like to create.
00311     int choice = QMessageBox::question(this,
00312         "New...",
00313         "Please choose a style:",
00314         "Single Agent", "Adversarial");
00315 
00316     choice++; // Conveniently the choice values + 1 equal the
00317               // corresponding PROGRAM_MODE values as of 10/3/05
00318 
00319     //Create the appropriate file view.
00320     IGNATView *newView =
00321         CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView( (PROGRAM_MODE) choice,
00322                                          QString(), this );
00323     //Make sure a proper view was created.
00324     if( newView == NULL )
00325         return;
00326 
00327     //Remove any current view that was open.
00328     if( m_view != NULL )
00329         removeToolBar( m_view->getToolBar() );
00330     addToolBar( newView->getToolBar() );
00331 
00332     //Delete any existing view that was currently open.
00333     if( m_view )
00334         delete m_view;
00335     m_view = newView;
00336 
00337     enableFileDependantActions();
00338 
00339     m_default->setShown( false );
00340     m_view->setShown( true );
00341     setCentralWidget( m_view );
00342 
00343     m_curFileName = "";
00344 }
00345 
00346 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00347 /// CGNATWindow::openClicked
00348 ///
00349 /// @description  This function is run when the user clicks the Open option to
00350 ///               open an existing file.  It prompts the user to locate the file
00351 ///               they wish to open.
00352 /// @pre          None
00353 /// @post         The file is loaded, if a valid file was selected.
00354 ///
00355 /// @limitations  None
00356 ///
00357 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00358 void CGNATWindow::openClicked()
00359 {
00360     QString openFileName( QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, "Open...",
00361                                                        m_filePath,
00362                                                        m_fileFilters) );
00363 
00364     if (!openFileName.isEmpty() && QFile::exists(openFileName))
00365         loadFile( openFileName );
00366 }
00367 
00368 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00369 /// CGNATWindow::openRecentClicked
00370 ///
00371 /// @description  This function opens the most recently opened file, if one
00372 ///               exists.
00373 /// @pre          None
00374 /// @post         None
00375 ///
00376 /// @limitations  None
00377 ///
00378 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00379 void CGNATWindow::openRecentClicked()
00380 {
00381     if( m_curFileName != "" )
00382         loadFile( m_curFileName );
00383 }
00384 
00385 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00386 /// CGNATWindow::saveAsClicked
00387 ///
00388 /// @description  This function prompts the user for a name and location to save
00389 ///               the currently active file to.  It then saves the file to the
00390 ///               given location, if it is valid.
00391 /// @pre          None
00392 /// @post         The active file is saved to the given location, if valid.
00393 ///
00394 /// @limitations  None
00395 ///
00396 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00397 void CGNATWindow::saveAsClicked()
00398 {
00399     //Make sure a file is currently open.
00400     if( m_view == NULL )
00401         return;
00402 
00403     //Get the save file name from the user.
00404     QString saveFileName( QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, "Save...",
00405                                                        m_filePath,
00406                                                        m_fileFilters ) );
00407 
00408     //Make sure the file was valid.
00409     if (!saveFileName.isEmpty())
00410     {
00411         //Append the file extension if the user didn't add it themselves.
00412         if ( !saveFileName.endsWith(".gnat", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) )
00413             saveFileName.append( ".gnat" );
00414         m_curFileName = saveFileName;
00415         m_view->saveToFile(m_curFileName);
00416         m_filePath = saveFileName.left( saveFileName.lastIndexOf("/") );
00417 
00418         QSettings settings;
00419         settings.setValue( "recentfile", m_curFileName );
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00424 /// CGNATWindow::saveClicked
00425 ///
00426 /// @description  This function saves the open file and prompts the user with a
00427 ///               Save As box if the file has not been previously saved.
00428 /// @pre          None
00429 /// @post         The file is saved, unless it has not been previously saved and
00430 ///               the user selected to cancel.
00431 ///
00432 /// @limitations  None
00433 ///
00434 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00435 void CGNATWindow::saveClicked()
00436 {
00437     //Make sure there is a file open.
00438     if( m_view == NULL )
00439         return;
00440 
00441     //Prompt the user with the Save As box if the file has not been previously
00442     //saved.
00443     if (m_curFileName.isEmpty())
00444         saveAsClicked();
00445     else
00446         m_view->saveToFile(m_curFileName);
00447 }
00448 
00449 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00450 /// CGNATWindow::saveImageClicked
00451 ///
00452 /// @description  This function is called when the user selects to save an image
00453 ///               of the current graph view.
00454 /// @pre          None
00455 /// @post         A PNG image is created of the graph view to the file specified
00456 ///               by the user, if valid.
00457 ///
00458 /// @limitations  None
00459 ///
00460 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00461 void CGNATWindow::saveImageClicked()
00462 {
00463     //Make sure a file is currently open.
00464     if ( m_view == NULL )
00465         return;
00466 
00467     //Get the name of the file the user wants to save the image to.
00468     QString saveFileName( QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this, "Save Image...",
00469                           m_filePath, tr("PNG Files (*.png)") ) );
00470 
00471     //Make sure the file name given is valid.
00472     if ( !saveFileName.isEmpty() )
00473     {
00474         //Append the PNG extension if the user didn't add it if the user didn't.
00475         if ( !saveFileName.endsWith(".png", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) )
00476             saveFileName.append( ".png" );
00477         m_view->saveImage( saveFileName );
00478     }
00479 }
00480 
00481 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00482 /// CGNATWindow::preferencesClicked
00483 ///
00484 /// @description     This function is called when the user selects Settings -->
00485 ///                  Preferences from the menu bar.
00486 ///
00487 /// @pre             None
00488 /// @post            The CEditStyleToolkit dialog is initialized and launched
00489 ///                  if an instance does not exist.  If an instance does exist
00490 ///                  that instance is made visible and active.
00491 ///
00492 /// @return void:    No return information is given
00493 ///
00494 /// @limitations     None
00495 ///
00496 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00497 void CGNATWindow::preferencesClicked()
00498 {
00499     static CEditStyleToolkit *dialog;
00500 
00501     if(CEditStyleToolkit::refCount() == 0)
00502         dialog = new CEditStyleToolkit((QWidget*)this);
00503 
00504     dialog->show();
00505     dialog->raise();
00506     dialog->activateWindow();
00507 }
00508 
00509 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00510 /// CGNATWindow::saveSettings
00511 ///
00512 /// @description  This function saves the current program settings to the
00513 ///               registry or equivalent in UNIX and Mac operating systems.
00514 /// @pre          None
00515 /// @post         The program settings are saved to the registry or equivalent
00516 ///               for UNIX and Mac operating systems.
00517 ///
00518 /// @limitations  None
00519 ///
00520 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00521 void CGNATWindow::saveSettings()
00522 {
00523     QSettings settings;
00524 
00525     if( isMaximized() )
00526         settings.setValue( "maximized", true );
00527     else
00528     {
00529         settings.setValue( "size", size() );
00530         settings.setValue( "maximized", false );
00531     }
00532 
00533     settings.setValue( "filepath", m_filePath );
00534 }
00535 
00536 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00537 /// CGNATWindow::setupActions
00538 ///
00539 /// @description  This function creates the QActions used for the main menu
00540 ///               options.
00541 /// @pre          None
00542 /// @post         The QActions for the main menus are created.
00543 ///
00544 /// @limitations     None
00545 ///
00546 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00547 void CGNATWindow::setupActions()
00548 {
00549     // File Menu type Actions
00550     m_newAction = new QAction( QIcon(":/new.png"), "New...", this );
00551     connect( m_newAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(newClicked()) );
00552 
00553     m_openAction = new QAction( QIcon(":/open.png"), "Open...", this );
00554     connect( m_openAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(openClicked()) );
00555 
00556     m_saveAction = new QAction( QIcon(":/save.png"), "Save", this );
00557     connect( m_saveAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(saveClicked()) );
00558 
00559     m_saveAsAction = new QAction( "Save As...", this );
00560     connect( m_saveAsAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(saveAsClicked()) );
00561 
00562     m_saveImageAction = new QAction( "Save Image...", this );
00563     connect( m_saveImageAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this,
00564              SLOT(saveImageClicked()));
00565 
00566     m_exitAction = new QAction( QIcon(":/exit.png"), "Exit", this );
00567     connect( m_exitAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(close()) );
00568 
00569     m_preferencesAction = new QAction("Preferences...", this);
00570     connect(m_preferencesAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(preferencesClicked()));
00571 
00572     m_aboutAction = new QAction( "About...", this );
00573     connect( m_aboutAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(aboutClicked()));
00574 }
00575 
00576 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00587 void CGNATWindow::setupContent()
00588 {
00589     setupDefaultView();
00590     m_view = NULL;
00591 
00592     setContentsMargins(4,4,4,4);
00593     setCentralWidget( m_default );
00594 }

00596 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00597 /// <function name>
00598 ///
00599 /// @description  This function sets up the initial display which gives the user
00600 ///               the option to create a new file, open an existing one, or open
00601 ///               the most recent file.
00602 /// @pre          None
00603 /// @post         The default view is created.
00604 ///
00605 /// @limitations  None
00606 ///
00607 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00608 void CGNATWindow::setupDefaultView()
00609 {
00610     m_default = new QFrame;
00611 
00612     m_defNew = new QToolButton(m_default);
00613     m_defNew->setText("New");
00614     m_defNew->setIcon(QIcon(":/new_large.png"));
00615     m_defNew->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon);
00616     m_defNew->setIconSize(QSize(70,70));
00617     m_defNew->setAutoRaise(true);
00618     connect( m_defNew, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(newClicked()));
00619 
00620     m_defOpen = new QToolButton(m_default);
00621     m_defOpen->setText("Open");
00622     m_defOpen->setIcon(QIcon(":/open_large.png"));
00623     m_defOpen->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon);
00624     m_defOpen->setIconSize(QSize(70,70));
00625     m_defOpen->setAutoRaise(true);
00626     connect( m_defOpen, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(openClicked()));
00627 
00628     m_defRecent = new QToolButton(m_default);
00629     m_defRecent->setText("Most Recent");
00630     m_defRecent->setIcon(QIcon(":/recent_large.png"));
00631     m_defRecent->setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextUnderIcon);
00632     m_defRecent->setIconSize(QSize(70,70));
00633     m_defRecent->setAutoRaise(true);
00634     connect( m_defRecent, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(openRecentClicked()));
00635 
00636     QGridLayout *defaultLayout = new QGridLayout;
00637     defaultLayout->addWidget(m_defNew, 0,0,1,1,
00638                              Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignVCenter);
00639     defaultLayout->addWidget(m_defOpen, 0,1,1,1,
00640                              Qt::AlignVCenter);
00641     defaultLayout->addWidget(m_defRecent, 0,2,1,1,
00642                              Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignVCenter);
00643 
00644     m_default->setLayout(defaultLayout);
00645 }
00646 
00647 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00648 /// CGNATWindow::setupMenuBar
00649 ///
00650 /// @description  This function sets up the the main menu bars.
00651 /// @pre          None
00652 /// @post         The main menus are created with the appropriate items on them.
00653 ///
00654 /// @limitations  None
00655 ///
00656 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00657 void CGNATWindow::setupMenuBar()
00658 {
00659     m_menuBar = menuBar();
00660 
00661     m_fileMenu = m_menuBar->addMenu("File");
00662     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_newAction);
00663     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_openAction);
00664     m_fileMenu->addSeparator();
00665     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_saveAction);
00666     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_saveAsAction);
00667     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_saveImageAction);
00668     m_fileMenu->addSeparator();
00669     m_fileMenu->addAction(m_exitAction);
00670 
00671     m_settingsMenu = m_menuBar->addMenu("Settings");
00672     m_settingsMenu->addAction(m_preferencesAction);
00673 
00674     m_helpMenu = m_menuBar->addMenu("Help");
00675     m_helpMenu->addAction(m_aboutAction);
00676 }
00677 
00678 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00679 /// CGNATWindow::setupSettings
00680 ///
00681 /// @description  This function sets the settings needed to store the
00682 ///               application settings to the registry or equivalent in UNIX
00683 ///               and Mac operating systems.
00684 /// @pre          None
00685 /// @post         The settings values are set.
00686 ///
00687 /// @limitations  None
00688 ///
00689 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00690 void CGNATWindow::setupSettings()
00691 {
00692     QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("UMR");
00693     QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("umr.edu");
00694     QCoreApplication::setApplicationName("GNAT");
00695 }

00697 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00698 /// CGNATWindow::setupToolBar
00699 ///
00700 /// @description  This function sets up the default toolbar which has the
00701 ///               new, open, and save options on it.
00702 /// @pre          None
00703 /// @post         The default toolbar is created.
00704 ///
00705 /// @limitations  None
00706 ///
00707 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00708 void CGNATWindow::setupToolBar()
00709 {
00710     setIconSize( QSize( 25, 25 ) );
00711 
00712     m_mainToolBar = addToolBar("Main");
